verses.verse: Are we beginning <S%G756><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> to commend <S%G4921><s%> ourselves <S%G1438><s%>? or <S%G1487><s%> need <S%G3361><s%> we <S%G5535><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> do <S%G5613><s%> some <S%G5100><s%>, epistles <S%G1992><s%> of commendation <S%G4956><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> from you <S%G5216><s%>?

Ye <S%G5210><s%> are <S%G2075><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> epistle <S%G1992><s%>, written <S%G1449><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%>, known <S%G1097><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> read <S%G314><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men <S%G444><s%>;

being made <S%G3754><s%> manifest <S%G5319><s%> that ye are <S%G2075><s%> an epistle <S%G1992><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%>, ministered <S%G1247><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> us <S%G2257><s%>, written <S%G1449><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> with ink <S%G3188><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> with the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of the living <S%G2198><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>; not <S%G3756><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> tables <S%G4109><s%> of stone <S%G3035><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> tables <S%G4109><s%> that are hearts <S%G2588><s%> of flesh <S%G4560><s%>.
And <S%G1161><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> confidence <S%G4006><s%> have we <S%G2192><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> God-ward <S%G2316><s%>:

not <S%G3756><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> we are <S%G2070><s%> sufficient <S%G2425><s%> of <S%G575><s%> ourselves <S%G1438><s%>, to account <S%G3049><s%> anything <S%G5100><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> from ourselves <S%G1438><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> sufficiency <S%G2426><s%> is from <S%G1537><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>;

who <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> made <S%G2427><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> sufficient as ministers <S%G1249><s%> of a new <S%G2537><s%> covenant <S%G1242><s%>; not <S%G3756><s%> of the letter <S%G1121><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> of the spirit <S%G4151><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> the letter <S%G1121><s%> killeth <S%G615><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> the spirit <S%G4151><s%> giveth life <S%G2227><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> the ministration <S%G1248><s%> of death <S%G1722><s%>, written <S%G1121><s%>, and engraven <S%G1795><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> stones <S%G3037><s%>, came <S%G1096><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%>, so that <S%G5620><s%> the children <S%G5207><s%> of Israel <S%G2474><s%> could <S%G1410><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> look <S%G816><s%> stedfastly upon <S%G1519><s%> the face <S%G4383><s%> of Moses <S%G3475><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> the glory <S%G1391><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> face <S%G4383><s%>; which <S%G3588><s%> glory was passing away <S%G2673><s%>:
how <S%G4459><s%> shall <S%G2071><s%> not <S%G3780><s%> rather <S%G3123><s%> the ministration <S%G1248><s%> of the spirit <S%G4151><s%> be <S%G2071><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%>?

For <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> the ministration <S%G1248><s%> of condemnation <S%G2633><s%> hath glory <S%G1391><s%>, much <S%G4183><s%> rather <S%G3123><s%> doth <S%G4052><s%> the ministration <S%G1248><s%> of righteousness <S%G1343><s%> exceed <S%G4052><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> verily <S%G2532><s%> that which <S%G3588><s%> hath been made glorious <S%G1392><s%> hath <S%G1392><s%> not <S%G3761><s%> been made glorious <S%G1392><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> respect <S%G3313><s%>, by reason of <S%G1752><s%> the glory <S%G1391><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> surpasseth <S%G5235><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> that which <S%G3588><s%> passeth away <S%G2673><s%> was <S%G1223><s%> with glory <S%G1391><s%>, much <S%G4183><s%> more <S%G3123><s%> that which <S%G3588><s%> remaineth <S%G3306><s%> is <S%G1722><s%> in glory <S%G1391><s%>.
Having <S%G2192><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> a hope <S%G1680><s%>, we use <S%G5530><s%> great <S%G4183><s%> boldness of speech <S%G3954><s%>,

and <S%G2532><s%> are not <S%G3756><s%> as <S%G2509><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%>, who put <S%G5087><s%> a veil <S%G2571><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G1438><s%> face <S%G4383><s%>, that <S%G4314><s%> the children <S%G5207><s%> of Israel <S%G2474><s%> should not <S%G3361><s%> look <S%G816><s%> stedfastly on <S%G1519><s%> the end <S%G5056><s%> of that which <S%G3588><s%> was passing away <S%G2673><s%>:

but <S%G235><s%> their <S%G846><s%> minds <S%G3540><s%> were hardened <S%G4456><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> until <S%G891><s%> this very day <S%G4594><s%> at the reading <S%G320><s%> of the old <S%G3820><s%> covenant <S%G1242><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> veil <S%G2571><s%> remaineth <S%G3306><s%>, it not being <S%G1909><s%> revealed <S%G343><s%> to them that it <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G5100><s%> done away <S%G2673><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>.

But <S%G235><s%> unto <S%G2193><s%> this day <S%G4594><s%>, whensoever <S%G2259><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> is read <S%G314><s%>, a veil <S%G2571><s%> lieth <S%G2749><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> their <S%G846><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%>.
But <S%G1161><s%> whensoever <S%G2259><s%> it <S%G302><s%> shall turn <S%G1994><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%>, the veil <S%G2571><s%> is taken away <S%G4014><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%>: and <S%G1161><s%> where <S%G3757><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> is <S%G1563><s%>, there is liberty <S%G1657><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> all <S%G3956><s%>, with <S%G4383><s%> unveiled <S%G343><s%> face <S%G4383><s%> beholding as in a mirror <S%G2734><s%> the glory <S%G1391><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%>, are transformed <S%G3339><s%> into the same <S%G846><s%> image <S%G1504><s%> from <S%G575><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%>, even as <S%G2509><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%>.
